definitions.definition: A cause; something that causes an effect
Making good, thorough, or careful use of resources; not consuming extra. Especially, making good use of time or energy
definitions.example: An efficient process would automate all the routine work.

definitions.definition: Expressing the proportion of consumed energy that was successfully used in a process; the ratio of useful output to total input
definitions.example: The motor is only 20% efficient at that temperature.

definitions.definition: Causing effects, producing results; bringing into being; initiating change (rare except in philosophical and legal expression efficient cause = causative factor or agent)
definitions.example: Ownership, maintenance, or use of the automobile need not be the direct and efficient cause of the injury sustained
